The best watch launcher ever.
Worked great on galaxy watch 5 pro.. a tiny bit buggy but does not work on new galaxy watch 6.
Really useful and innovative app. The only problem is that it leaves a permanent notification about it being displaying over other apps when swiping left.
I love trying new things for my watch this is cool..
Awesome

This app is a very cool idea and it works well. Pretty much my only complaint is the perpetual notification. It's annoying because once and a while my watch beeps and I think it's important even it's not.
Simply amazing
Doesn't work. Just keeps taking me back to settings
Every time I want to use it I have to turn the Gesture Launcher back on, as it gets turned off in the background and I don't see why. Samsung Watch 5 Pro.
Good One
Willnot load on galaxy watch 4
thank you very much :)

Using the app is definitely fun but completely useless in real :) Sign recognition works surprisingly nice - even if u draw your sign very wrong it will recognize it in most cases! But the recognition of tap to run the app is surprisingly bad. After four days of use i still need 5-10 attempts to succeed. And also swipe, from that side (which you set up to tap) gets to work very bad. And unskipable notification... That's just weird. So, to run your app in usual way will be way faser and easier.
Pretty slick
Mine hasn't been able to sync for months on end so can't add any new patterns anymore 🤷🏻‍♂️
On my Galaxy watch 4 it works great, but I can't seem to figure out how to work it on my phone can someone please tell me how to use this on the note 20 ultra. Please and thank you

I really like this app, I would gladly pay for it but there are 2 things that are annoying IMHO. it requires "draw over" permission. If I enable it I have a permanent notification complaining about this permission, if I disable it I can't open the settings because it asks for the permission right away. I decided to turn off the above permission, I start the app by pressing a button, it takes around 5 seconds to start tho
The app is super accurate, fast and useful. People say that they face issues. I personally didn't have any issue at all. Great app.

Love it so far on GW4. With Tasker you can use it to turn on smart bulbs and whatever else you can imagine. Like the fantastic old GMD Gestures app but for my watch. Dev - I know this hasn't been updated in years but I'm sure I'm not the only one who would pay for this if you updated to add a tile option or the ability to launch the gesture screen as it's own app so it could be tied to double tap button. With Wear finally getting more popular maybe you could cash in haha
The app works fine, except there is an ongoing notification that I can't get rid of. How do I get rid of it? If I can't get rid of it, I'll uninstall the app.
Good but how to clear notification

Works totally fine on to watch 3 pro. It's a shame all the apps in the app drawer are not selectable for gestures. If you can't launch find my phone from your launcher, then it's a pretty useless launcher :(
Excellent thanks 👍
Brilliant.... if it worked consistently..

It rarely works on the galaxy watch 4. The video I saw on YouTube about it was seemless. I was embarrassed when I tried to show my wife how it works. I tap the screen and nothing happens. Works about 10% of the time. Might Uninstaller not really making anything easier
Simple and amazing. Can I give 10 stars?

This app is an EASY 5 if it worked consistently. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. The point of the app is to make watch navigation quicker and it ends up becoming slower and unreliable. When it works though it's amazing. I'm hanging on for an update.
A must have app for wearOS devices!
Works perfectly on Ticwatch Pro 3.
Great idea, but doesn't work. Basically quick launcher bar disappears very often. Useless
Good app
I love it. But I changed the setting "show quick launcher" to off so I could use physical buttons to activate, but now I can't open the app anymore lol. Help!
doesn't work

Wow! Love it
Wow seems awesome so far.
Very nice app that I wish Google had by default but this app has great features WELL DONE DEVELOPER
This is definitely a must-have application with almost unlimited features thanks to the integration of Tasker
I'm truly impressed with how well and easily it works.
Fantastic App one of the best app for the Galaxy Watch 4 Classic 46mm LTE

Works Okay on Galaxy Watch 4 Classic. The gestures are easy to add and remove. The accuracy is good unless you have very similar gestures. Three problem is that it does not open the gesture recognizer reliably. I have to tap the edge multiple times for it to launch. TIP: Assign the watch home button double tap to launch the gesture launcher. Then go to settings of gesture launcher and set "show launcher" to OFF. Then you can double tap to open the recognized everytime! Thanks for the app!
it is good however the quick launch only works when you you restart the app every time which defeats the point
Good app. Though it is supporting wear os 3. Don't know if developer will support with further updates
Works perfect with galaxy 4 so far
Downloads, connects, syncs, Assigns gesture but doesn't work on my galaxy watch 4.
Can't clear ongoing notification but other than that this is great
When it works, works well. But most of the time it won't work. Have to restart the app on the watch to make it work again, so what's the point?
Good app but please make this tasker action toast message optional if trigger multiple while phone off it shows 10 min notifications non stop
It works well on my Moto 360 sport
It is very handy arguably a must have app on wear os
Excellent so far, really adds speed and smartwatch "feel" and expectation to the experience. Running on Mobvoi Ticwatch Pro 2020
must have

This app is THE BEST LAUNCHER on Wear OS ever, it makes a mockery of all the rest. I want to pay the developer but it's FREE! This has made using my new ticwatch soooo much easier and intuitive. I LOVE IT! I'd give it 10 stars if I could. The only improvement I can think of would be to allow a second part to a gesture (e.g. crossing a lower case "t") it might cause a slight delay but could be a user option and would make it truly unbeatable.
Simple to use and worked right the first time.
T.O.P
Very well made, must have app. Some of system Applications are not shown, personally I miss Agenda.

It works well. Takes a few seconds to create custom gestures and link to actions on a ticwatch. Makes it super easy to launch stuff without clicking through various buttons, or scrolling through apps and touching small launch areas.
A bit buggy but very cool

Must have app for my watch. Tip, if you do it backwards it's a completely different gesture. In other words it doesn't just track the shape it tracks how you make it. The only problem is it's closing by itself sometimes but that might be Wear OS's fault and it's now enough to drop a star for.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback! Really appreciate it. I'm planning to upgrade and refactor some of the code in the coming months, so hopefully it will solve most of the issues.

google_play_reviews.content: Love this app. I would have given it 5 stars if the Call history worked
Great idea. Great app.
Works Great
This works so well I wish it was built into wear OS
Works well
Good app solve the purpose, but i guess it is not working with tasker. Please support some gestures for turning of wifi, mobile data from watch. I like this app. Great job developer.
Convenience
Love the app but when I use the gesture to open Google play it opens the app to find my phone. Can you please fix this?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review, and sorry for any inconvenience! Will try my best to fix it in next version.

google_play_reviews.content: this app is super handy. let's you hey into your favorite apps fast. i would love to see development on one handed moron gestures tough
This app is amazing. Period.
works perfectly on ticwatch s2
hello, this is very good app, and it really help me alot, but if i can make suggestions, can you add setting, so you can only using gesture on watch face. thank you
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the suggestion! Will try to add it in the next version.

google_play_reviews.content: This app literally made my smartwatch into everything I had hoped a smartwatch would be. I absolutely love it. Very snappy response and the gestures are easy to add, so I can open nearly any app in no time. Only 2 slight complaints: I can't make a gesture for the Google Fit Breathing app for some reason and also UPDATE: it wasn't the width that turned off the screen tap, I have to open the app on my watch every time I charge my watch for the screen tap shortcut to work. (Fossil Sport).
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback! I'll definitely look into it and solve the problems soon

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent app. Grt addition to Wear watch
Excellent app for smartwatch!

A very good idea and quite a good implementation! Thanks a lot. There are issues however that I would like to point out: 1. Major - I understand its a gesture launcher, but if we speak shapes or letters, it shouldnt depend where you start it. E.g. when drawing triangle for Play Store, you have to draw it in exact order, not just a triangle. 2. Moderate - overlay is also active on keyboard, meaning you cannot use certain keys, unless you are swyping. 3. Minor - Sometimes the app is getting killed
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks a lot for your suggestions! Will try to fix these problems in the next update

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent but would be better if it didn't need to be reopened so often. Be good of it started automatically.
Wow! This is a must have.

I'm having a really difficult time using this app with my Android 7.0 phone and Android Wear 1.5 watch. Half the time I get an "Unfortunately [this app] has stopped working", and the other half the app won't shut up. i mean sure it does the job, but it won't stop showing the toast on the phone. and the watch app still shows it's sending even after its already sent. the action had already been completed.... Blocking the notifications on my phone still won't get rid of the toast messages.

Unfortunately stops working basically every time but nice idea nonetheless. Update 1: upon reinstallation, the launcher does seem to work, but it blocks all subsequent swipes for a couple of seconds. Update 2: crashed again; lost all hope and deleted.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for this, could you give me any more information? like after which android update? it would really help, thanks！

google_play_reviews.content: Hi, very useful app. Fast and accurate. Please add shortcut for settings like bluetooth, wifi, always on screen. Thank you.

This was an excellent app that worked great when I got it 2-3 days ago- just before the Wear OS upgrade. It worked for a day and, now, with the OS upgrade, it's stopped working. This does not work with new OS wear software!!!!! However developer got straight back to me, within a day, and said he would have a look. That's great support!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for any inconvenience, I will look into it soon update to solve it as soon as possible. Please email me first if you have any other problem. This is a free software that doesn't even have ads, it doesn't cost you anything. Thank you!

google_play_reviews.content: This is super handy. It works great. I sent the developer an idea for a new functionally and they were super responsive.
Excellent on the watch, but on my mobile it crashes. I suggest adding the possibility to launch the App drawer and the Google assidtant.

Great idea works well but makes it impossible to use with the stock calculator app because ticwatch e needs the tap area extended for this app to be useful.  Edit - ignore what I've wrote above, I have discovered you can shorten the height of the tap area.

Just for the support provided by the developer alone, I'm leaving a 5 star 
review... Waiting for the update to support Google Pay wear app shortcut. 
Thank you!
Changed the way I used my watch... Amazing app
